quests.quest_title: What type of curb is this?
quests.quest_description: Identify the type of curb here.

quests.quest_title: What type of lowered curb is this?
quests.quest_description: Identify if this is a curb ramp or blended transition.

quests.quest_title: What type of ramp placement is this?
quests.quest_description: Select this ramp's placement type.

quests.quest_title: Does this curb ramp align with the crosswalk?
quests.quest_description: Check if this curb ramp lines up with the pedestrian crossing.

quests.quest_title: Does this curb ramp have edge protection?
quests.quest_description: Check if there is a vertical barrier to prevent falls.

quests.quest_title: What is the width of this curb ramp?
quests.quest_description: Measure the clear width of this curb ramp, in inches.

quests.quest_title: What is the running slope of this curb ramp?
quests.quest_description: Measure the incline along the direction of travel, as a percentage.

quests.quest_title: What is the cross slope of this curb ramp?
quests.quest_description: Measure the side-to-side incline of this curb ramp, as a percentage.

quests.quest_title: What is the width of this ramp's landing?
quests.quest_description: Measure the width of this ramp's top landing area, in inches.

quests.quest_title: What is the depth of this ramp's landing?
quests.quest_description: Measure the depth of this ramp's top landing area, in inches.

quests.quest_title: What is the slope of this ramp's side flares?
quests.quest_description: Measure the slope of this ramp's side flares, as a percentage.

quests.quest_title: What is the surface material of this curb ramp?
quests.quest_description: Identify the material this curb ramp is made of.

quests.quest_title: Are there detectable warnings or a tactile strip present?
quests.quest_description: Check if there is a tactile warning surface at this curb.

quests.quest_title: What is the depth of this detectable warning surface?
quests.quest_description: Measure the depth of this tactile warning surface, in inches.

quests.quest_title: What is the gutter slope?
quests.quest_description: Measure the slope of the gutter along the pedestrian access route as a percentage.

quests.quest_title: What is the width of this sidewalk?
quests.quest_description: Please measure the clear width of this sidewalk, excluding any obstructions, in inches.

quests.quest_title: What is the width of this sidewalk at its narrowest point?
quests.quest_description: Please measure the clear width of this sidewalk, at its narrowest point, in inches.

quests.quest_title: What is the cross slope of this sidewalk at its steepest point?
quests.quest_description: Measure the side-to-side tilt of this sidewalk, as a percentage.

quests.quest_title: What type of curb edge does this sidewalk have?
quests.quest_description: Select the type of curb for this sidewalk.

quests.quest_title: What is the surface material of this sidewalk?
quests.quest_description: Select the material that best describes this sidewalk's surface.

quests.quest_title: Is this sidewalk's surface in good condition?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this sidewalk's surface is firm, stable, and slip-resistant.

quest_answer_choices.choice_text: No: not Firm, Stable, and Slip-Resistant

quests.quest_title: Is this sidewalk's surface cracked?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this sidewalk's surface has large cracks.

quests.quest_title: Is this sidewalk's surface heaved?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this sidewalk's surface is heaved.

quests.quest_title: Is this sidewalk's surface uneven?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this sidewalk's surface is uneven.

quests.quest_title: Is this sidewalk's surface slippery?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this sidewalk's surface is slippery.

quests.quest_title: Is this sidewalk's surface eroded?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this sidewalk's surface is eroded.

quests.quest_title: Is this sidewalk's surface loose?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this sidewalk's surface is loose.

quests.quest_title: Are there any obstructions on the sidewalk?
quests.quest_description: Select any obstructions that reduce the clear width of the sidewalk.

quests.quest_title: Are there frequent temporary obstructions on this sidewalk?
quests.quest_description: Select any obstructions that reduce the clear width of the sidewalk.

quests.quest_title: Is there something here to indicate the presence of a bus stop?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this bus stop has signage or infrastructure to visually identify that this location is a bus stop.

quests.quest_title: Does this bus stop have a sandwich board to visually identify this stop?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this bus stop has sandwich board to visually identify that this location is a bus stop.

quests.quest_title: Does this bus stop have a bus stop pole to visually identify this stop?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this bus stop has bus stop pole to visually identify that this location is a bus stop.

quests.quest_title: Does this bus stop have a shelter?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this bus stop has a shelter to protect waiting passengers from weather conditions.

quests.quest_title: Does this bus stop have any seating available?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this bus stop has a place for waiting passengers to sit.

quests.quest_title: Is there a pole seat here?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this bus stop has a pole seat for waiting passengers to sit on.

quests.quest_title: Is there a bench here?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this bus stop has a bench for waiting passengers to sit on.

quests.quest_title: Is there an informal seating place here?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this bus stop has an informal seating spot that waiting passengers sit on.

quests.quest_title: Does this bus stop have schedule information posted?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this bus stop has schedule information posted.

quests.quest_title: How is the schedule information posted?
quests.quest_description: Indicate how this bus stop displays schedule information.

quests.quest_title: Is the posted schedule accurate and up to date?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether the schedule posted at this stop is up to date and accurate.

quests.quest_title: Is there a waste bin here?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this location has a publicly accessible trash can present.

quests.quest_title: What level of lighting is present?
quests.quest_description: Indicate the degree to which this bus stop is lit.

quests.quest_title: Is there a public restroom nearby?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether there is a public restroom near this bus stop.

quest_answer_choices.choice_text: Yes, directly next to this stop

quests.quest_title: Is there ADA-compliant parking nearby?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether there is ADA-compliant parking near this bus stop.

quest_answer_choices.choice_text: Yes, directly next to this stop

quests.quest_title: How do pedestrians access this bus stop?
quests.quest_description: Indicate the type of walkway pedestrians use to reach this bus stop.

quests.quest_title: What is the surface material of this bus stop's access path?
quests.quest_description: Indicate the type of surface material for this bus stop's access path.

quests.quest_title: Is this bus stop access path's surface in good condition?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this bus stop access path's surface is firm, stable, and slip-resistant.

quest_answer_choices.choice_text: No: not Firm, Stable, and Slip-Resistant

quests.quest_title: Is this bus stop access path's surface cracked?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this bus stop access path's surface has large cracks.

quests.quest_title: Is this bus stop access path's surface heaved?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this bus stop access path's surface is heaved.

quests.quest_title: Is this bus stop access path's surface uneven?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this bus stop access path's surface is uneven.

quests.quest_title: Is this bus stop access path's surface slippery?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this bus stop access path's surface is slippery.

quests.quest_title: Is this bus stop access path's surface eroded?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this bus stop access path's surface is eroded.

quests.quest_title: Is this bus stop access path's surface loose?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this bus stop access path's surface is loose.

quests.quest_title: Are there any obstacles present on the access path leading to this bus stop?
quests.quest_description: Indicate the presence of any barriers to getting to this bus stop.

quests.quest_title: Is there a tree obstructing this access path?
quests.quest_description: Indicate if trees are a barrier to travel for this access path.

quests.quest_title: Is there a tree root causing a disruption on this stop's access path?
quests.quest_description: Indicate if tree roots are a barrier to travel for this access path.

quests.quest_title: Is there overgrown vegetation obstructing the access path?
quests.quest_description: Indicate if overgrown vegetation is a barrier to travel for this access path.

quests.quest_title: Are there parked cars obstructing the access path?
quests.quest_description: Indicate if parked cars are a barrier to travel for this access path.

quests.quest_title: Is there a utility pole obstructing the access path?
quests.quest_description: Indicate if utility poles are a barrier to travel for this access path.

quests.quest_title: Are there signs or advertisements obstructing the access path?
quests.quest_description: Indicate if signs or advertisements are a barrier to travel for this access path.

quests.quest_title: Is there street furniture obstructing the access path?
quests.quest_description: Indicate if street furniture such as street cabinets are a barrier to travel for this access path.

quests.quest_title: Are there curb cuts for the sidewalk leading to this bus stop?
quests.quest_description: Indicate the presence of curb cuts (curb ramps) to access this bus stop.

quests.quest_title: What type of curb cuts lead to this bus stop?
quests.quest_description: Indicate the type of curb cuts that access this bus stop.

quests.quest_title: Do the curb ramps that lead to this bus stop have tactile paving?
quests.quest_description: Indicate the presence of tactile paving warning surfaces for curb cuts that lead to access for this bus stop.

quests.quest_title: Are there crosswalks nearby that lead to this bus stop?
quests.quest_description: Indicate the presence of crosswalks that access this bus stop.

quests.quest_title: Is there a paved shoulder on this roadway?
quests.quest_description: Indicate the presence of a traversable shoulder for this roadway.

quests.quest_title: What is the slope of this sidewalk or roadway at its steepest point?
quests.quest_description: Measure the slope of this walkway, as a percentage.

quests.quest_title: What is the cross slope of this sidewalk or roadway at its steepest point?
quests.quest_description: Measure the side-to-side tilt of this sidewalk, as a percentage.

quests.quest_title: What is the distance between where the pedestrian waits and the nearest traffic lane, in feet?
quests.quest_description: Measure the distance between bus stop and traffic lane in feet.

quests.quest_title: What is the speed limit on this street?
quests.quest_description: Record the speed limit for the street where this bus stop is located.

quests.quest_title: Is this bus stop located in a flood zone?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this bus stop is periodically flooded or experiences drainage issues.

quests.quest_title: Are there markings at this intersection to delineate a crosswalk?
quests.quest_description: Indicate the presence of markings to indicate a crosswalk at this location.

quests.quest_title: What kind of markings delineate this crosswalk?
quests.quest_description: Indicate the type of crosswalk markings at this location.

quests.quest_title: What is the condition of the crosswalk markings?
quests.quest_description: Select the best description of the crosswalk markings condition.

quests.quest_title: What is the surface condition of this crosswalk?
quests.quest_description: Select the best description of the crosswalk surface in terms of firmness, stability, and slip resistance.

quests.quest_title: Is this crosswalk located in a flood zone?
quests.quest_description: Indicate whether this crosswalk is periodically flooded or experiences drainage issues.
